narrative.narrative: Nordavia calls Talagi Airport in Arkhangelsk in Russia's north home. Formed in 1963 as Arkhangelsk United Aviation Squadron. From 2004-2009 it was a part of Aeroflot and called Aeroflot-Nord. It is now owned by Norilsk Nickel, as Russian mining company. They serves 21 destinations, all but 1 being in Russia, that being Tromso,Norway. Thier fleet is nine 737-500's.
